Desc.entry: Mrs Kamla Gilbert offers piano and music theory (music literacy) tuition for children and young adults aged 6-18 years of age. Teaching follows the ABRSM syllabus including the ABRSM Prep Test, piano Grades 1-8 and music theory Grades 1-5. Teaches from own home in the S2 area of Sheffield. Qualifications - ALCM, CertHE.
